expectedBehavior.southMirrorRoom: Large square room with tall ceilings, enormous mirror on south wall
expectedBehavior.examineResponse: There is an amazing mirror on the wall. It appears to be a gate to another world.
expectedBehavior.touchResponse: There is a rumble from deep within the earth and the room shakes...
expectedBehavior.northMirrorRoom: Narrow north-south passageway with large mirror to the south
expectedBehavior.teleportation: Touching mirror teleports player between North and South Mirror Rooms

notes: Two separate Mirror Rooms exist: South (large square) and North (narrow passage)
Touching mirror in either room teleports to the other
Mirror can be used repeatedly for bidirectional travel
Examining mirror shows it's a 'gate to another world'
Troll combat is random - may need multiple attempts
